snippet: Microsoft redesigned its Office applications to take advantage of trends like touch-based devices, social networking and cloud computing.
abstract: Microsoft unveils its next version of Office, which is redesigned to take advantage of trends like touch-based devices, social networking and cloud computing; analysts agree Microsoft is making bold changes with the product, but company leaves unanswered some key questions about its plans, including how much it will charge for the software and when it plans to release it in its final form.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft redesigned its Office applications to take advantage of trends like touch-based devices, social networking and cloud computing.

headline.seo: Microsoft Unveils Touch-Based Version of Office
headline.main: In Nod to New Era, Microsoft Unveils Touch-Based Version of Office
